name: QuickBooks Point of Sale Data File
summary: Learn about .QPB files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Backup QPB files use the following file naming convention: YYYYMMDD####.qpb where YYYY is the year, MM is the month, DD is the day, and #### is the sequence number for the backup (e.g., 0001, 0002, etc.).
NOTE: To restore a QPB file from backup, select File â†’ Restore in QuickBooks POS. From the dialog, you can choose the "Default Location" or a custom location.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
